trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Tamuning
There were no other sightings in Tamuning on or around July 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were fishing in the harbor at Naval Base, Guam when we observed a bright green cone shaped light streak accross the sky from south to north. There was no sound and it light up the whole area. It disaperaed accross the horizion. We didn't think too much about it until after we saw a show about UFO's where 2 airline pilots saw the same green light pass by their aircraft. We have also observed a faint white blinking light that appeared to be at a very high altitude, possibly outside of the earth's attmosphere and it was doing circular movement. We observed this light on numerous occassions at the same time several nights in a row. Again there was no sound and no military activity in the area.
